description: Resamples a 'data parent' dataset to the grid defined by an 'anat parent' dataset.

dpar.title: Data parent dataset
dpar.description: Set the data parent dataset (nonoptional). dset may contain a sub-brick selector, e.g., -dpar 'dset+orig[2,5,7]'

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Set the prefix for the output dataset. Default is the prefix of 'dset'.

dxyz.title: Grid spacing
dxyz.description: Set the grid spacing in the output dataset. Default is 1 mm.

force.title: Force overwrite
force.description: Write out result even if it means deleting an existing dataset. Default is not to overwrite.

resam.title: Resampling mode
resam.description: Set resampling mode for all sub-bricks. Modes: NN (Nearest Neighbor), Li (Linear Interpolation), Cu (Cubic Interpolation), Bk (Blocky Interpolation). Default is Li for all sub-bricks.

thr.title: Threshold resampling mode
thr.description: Set resampling mode for threshold sub-bricks. Modes: NN (Nearest Neighbor), Li (Linear Interpolation), Cu (Cubic Interpolation), Bk (Blocky Interpolation).

func.title: Functional resampling mode
func.description: Set resampling mode for functional sub-bricks. Modes: NN (Nearest Neighbor), Li (Linear Interpolation), Cu (Cubic Interpolation), Bk (Blocky Interpolation).
